item.title: I-Team: FBI warns property owners, realtors about "title pirates"
item.description: The FBI's Boston office is issuing a warning after a series of I-Team investigations into stolen land scams.

item.title: Trump to announce new tariffs amid fears of higher prices
item.description: President Trump is expected to announce the details of his reciprocal tariffs plan after 4 p.m. at the White House.

item.title: "JFK" director: Reinvestigate assassination at "scene of the crime"
item.description: Oliver Stone's "JFK" was nominated for eight Oscars and grossed more than $200 million but was also dogged by questions about its historical accuracy.

item.title: 4/1: America Decides
item.description: Trump tariff fears mount; A discussion with the authors of "Fight: Inside The Wildest Battle For The White House"

item.title: 4/1: CBS Evening News Plus
item.description: What to expect in Trump's "Liberation Day" tariff announcement; Reporter's Notebook: Shifting rationale for Trump's "Liberation Day"
